<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Implement's Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3727) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 47</row>

</column>

---

By weakening your relation to the ground and strengthening your relation to the sky, you've learned to soar through the air, your [implement](/classes/thaumaturge/implements) carrying you as surely as any broomstick or pestle. As long as you're holding a thaumaturge implement, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
name: Implement's Flight
